AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Lone wolf
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a lonely wandering traveler who is looking for the meaning of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} life or something more. In the eternity that [PAWN_nameDef] traveled the world, {PAWN_gender ? he : she} was able to achieve amazing skills in defense and survival, killing dangerous monsters and staying overnight in godforsaken places that no one who valued {PAWN_gender ? his : her} life would go to. Who knows if [PAWN_nameDef] will ever find a home or also wander the world in search of something important?
